snippet.title: Unruly Heroes - Official Trailer [XboxOne | Nintendo Switch | PS4 | PC]
snippet.description:
Unruly Heroes is an action-adventure game.
Inspired by the famous chinese legend, "A journey to the west", better known as the Monkey King Legend, the game will make you live a fantastic and unforgettable experience through a rich and amazing universe.
The game can be played in coop up to 4 players, but you can decide to play online in fierce Player vs Player modes !

Xbox One, ID@Xbox, Ps4, Switch, Pc.

🔹 Follow our adventure: 
Game: https://www.unrulyheroes.com/
Blog: https://www.magicdesignstudios.com/blog
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MagicDesignGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MagicDesignStudios/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/magicdesignstudios/
Press Kit: https://www.unrulyheroes.com/press
